actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide that salary cost-of-living adjustments for Members of Congress shall take effect at the beginning of the Congress in which they are proposed.

summary.text: Declares that under the Legislative Reorganization Act, cost-of-living pay adjustments for Members of Congress may take effect no earlier than the beginning of the Congress next following the Congress in which they are proposed.

titles.title: A bill to provide that salary cost-of-living adjustments for Members of Congress shall take effect at the beginning of the Congress in which they are proposed.
